Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation:
set proxy = ##super() set proxy.athlete = ..Athlete.ConvertToProxyObject()
quit proxy

Method.name: Create
Method.Implementation:
if ..CompetitionAthleteIdxExists(competitionId, athleteId) { set obj = ..CompetitionAthleteIdxOpen(competitionId, athleteId) set obj.IsActive = 1 set st = obj.%Save() quit obj }
set obj = ..%New() set obj.Athlete = ##class(Person).%OpenId(athleteId) set obj.Competition = ##class(Dance.Data.Competition).%OpenId(competitionId) set obj.Created = $ZDT($ZTS, 3) set st = obj.%Save() quit obj
